macro_markets.query: What are the most important macroeconomic and stock market news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major index movements, Fed/central bank news, and significant company earnings or announcements.

items.title: US Stock Markets Closed on New Year's Day, No Trading on Jan 1, 2026
items.summary: NYSE and Nasdaq are closed today for New Year's Day holiday, with trading resuming Friday, Jan 2. Bond markets are also closed, and investor focus shifts to 2026 outlook on Fed rates, economic growth, and earnings.

items.title: US Stocks Slide on Dec 31 Due to Year-End Profit-Taking
items.summary: S&P 500 fell 0.22% to 6,881.30, Nasdaq down 0.20% to 23,371.49, and Dow dropped 0.26% amid high valuations and no Santa rally. All major indices posted double-digit gains for 2025 despite the late dip.

items.title: US Initial Jobless Claims Fall Below Expectations on Dec 31
items.summary: Weekly initial jobless claims dropped to 199,000 for the week ended Dec 27, beating forecasts of 220,000 and down 16,000 from prior week. This positive labor data emerged amid market weakness.

items.title: Nike Shares Jump as CEO Buys $1 Million in Stock
items.summary: Nike stock rose over 2% after CEO Elliott Hill purchased $1 million worth of shares. This stood out as all sectors declined on the final trading day of 2025.

items.title: Stocks Dip in Final Hours of 2025 Trading
items.summary: S&P 500 down 0.2%, Dow fell 100 points or 0.2%, Nasdaq off 0.1% as markets closed the year lower with light volume. Indices ended 2025 near records after strong annual gains.

crypto_news.query: What are the most significant cryptocurrency and blockchain news from the past 24 hours? Include major price movements, regulatory news, and notable project developments.

items.title: Bitcoin Hits Record High of $88,000 as 2026 Begins
items.summary: Bitcoin started 2026 at a historic high of around $88,000, driven by strong institutional and retail demand, limited supply of 19.96 million coins, and perceptions as 'digital gold' amid expectations of easing monetary policy. Analysts warn of high volatility and potential sharp pullbacks.

items.title: Ethereum and Altcoins Rally with Significant Growth
items.summary: Ethereum shows substantial price increases alongside other altcoins like BNB, Solana, Cardano, and Polkadot, fueled by expanding ecosystems, DeFi TVL growth, and next-generation blockchain developments. Stablecoins like USDT and USDC provide liquidity, while memecoins like Dogecoin remain volatile.

items.title: Bitcoin and Ethereum ETFs Attract Record Institutional Investments
items.summary: Approval of BTC and ETH ETFs has drawn unprecedented institutional inflows, boosting market confidence. Traditional finance firms including banks and payment systems are expanding crypto and stablecoin support.

items.title: U.S. Advances Crypto Regulation with CLARITY Act
items.summary: The U.S. is developing regulatory frameworks like the CLARITY Act alongside BTC and ETH ETF approvals. Major players such as BlackRock, Fidelity, and JPMorgan are broadening their crypto services.

items.title: EU Implements MiCA for Uniform Crypto Rules; Asia Builds Favorable Infrastructure
items.summary: The EU has rolled out MiCA regulation for standardized crypto market rules. Japan, Singapore, and South Korea are enhancing crypto-friendly infrastructure.

items.title: Central Banks Accelerate CBDC Testing and Blockchain Innovations Surge
items.summary: Central banks in China and EU countries are testing CBDCs. Blockchain sees rapid growth in DeFi apps, NFTs, Web3 projects, and fast networks like Solana and Avalanche.

ai_news.query: What are the most important artificial intelligence and machine learning news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include new model releases, company announcements, research breakthroughs, and industry trends.

gaming.query: What are the most notable video game and gaming industry news from the past 24 hours? Include game releases, announcements, esports, and industry developments.

tech_news.query: What are the most important technology news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major product launches, company news, and significant tech industry developments. Exclude AI-specific news.
